mapper.insert:
insert into enterprise_master_data.production_equipment(production_equipment_no, production_equipment_name, production_equipment_type_no, production_equipment_number, hazard_level, importance_level, remark_info, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.productionEquipmentNo}, #{entity.productionEquipmentName}, #{entity.productionEquipmentTypeNo}, #{entity.productionEquipmentNumber}, #{entity.hazardLevel}, #{entity.importanceLevel}, #{entity.remarkInfo}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into enterprise_master_data.production_equipment(production_equipment_no, production_equipment_name, production_equipment_type_no, production_equipment_number, hazard_level, importance_level, remark_info, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.productionEquipmentNo}, #{entity.productionEquipmentName}, #{entity.productionEquipmentTypeNo}, #{entity.productionEquipmentNumber}, #{entity.hazardLevel}, #{entity.importanceLevel}, #{entity.remarkInfo}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update production_equipment_no = values(production_equipment_no) , production_equipment_name = values(production_equipment_name) , production_equipment_type_no = values(production_equipment_type_no) , production_equipment_number = values(production_equipment_number) , hazard_level = values(hazard_level) , importance_level = values(importance_level) , remark_info = values(remark_info) , deleted = values(deleted) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
